text:
@ochocinco $lestermayo
I am hard working and have a tryout coming up with an agent for basketball. I was recently laid off as a PE Teacher at Sandburg Elementary due to Covid-19 and lost my coaching job at i9 Sports due to Covid-19. Unemployment hasn't pulled thru. Please help champ legend.
